decision_conditions: The proposed rear extension, by reason of its excessive depth and position close to the boundaries of the site, would form a dominant and intrusive feature which would have an overbearing impact, resulting in a significant loss of outlook and an increased sense of enclosure to the detriment of the amenity of the occupiers of No.39 Wallenger Avenue contrary to Policy 7 and 26 of the Havering Local Plan 2021 and Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2011.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the agent via email on 12/08/22.
description: Single storey side/rear extension and porch to front
